subNodes.conversationText: root
What can I do for you, <FirstName>?
I'd like to ask you some questions.
What would you like to know?
Why did you decide to travel with your sister and her band?
Oh, I don't like to stay in one place too long.  Ever since we crossed the Great Mountains to the West, we haven't felt at home.
Continue
Lisa and I haven't met many Eastern Elf survivors.
Continue
Our mother, Veloria, still lives with the Western Elves in Lorenwaite.
Continue
Lisa and I mostly stay in Aberfax.  That's where she met Brendan and started the band.
Continue
I travel with her most of the time.  Mostly I just want to get out and explore.
Continue
Is there anything else you would like to ask?
Yes...
What would you like to know?
Not right now.
How did you and your sister survive the attacks by Zorn's creatures?
Our mother had Sildor and Sandur escort us through the Dwarven Great Halls.
Continue
Our parents stayed back to continue holding off the attacks of Zorn's evil creatures.
Continue
Our father, Galdor, died saving our mother's life.
Continue
Our mother, and a few others, were the last Charnians to pass through before the Mountain Dwarves collapsed the main caves, separating us from Zorn's vicious creatures.
Continue
We stayed with the Eastern Elves for many years, but Lisa and I live in Aberfax now.
Continue
Is there anything else you would like to ask?
Yes...
What would you like to know?
Not right now.
Do you think Ian is alright?
As you know, your brother and I didn't always see eye to eye.
Continue
We met many times on our travels.  We would always come across him in the forest somewhere.
Continue
He always noticed us first.  He is very skilled in the wild and can go undetected, if he so chooses.
Continue
I'm sure he and his friends are safe.  They know how to avoid trouble.
Continue
Is there anything else you would like to ask?
Yes...
What would you like to know?
Not right now.
How do you feel about searching for my father, Adwen?
I'm part of this journey to the end...
Continue
...And for me, the end will come only after we learn of your father's fate.
Thank you Miki, you are much needed on this journey.
Is there anything else you would like to ask?
Yes...
What would you like to know?
Not right now.
Do you think we will be successful at freeing Adwen?
I believe so...we have already accomplished more than anyone would have thought.
Continue
Plus, with Jerun's diversion, the fortress should be less guarded.
I agree, that'll help.
Is there anything else you would like to ask?
Yes...
What would you like to know?
Not right now.
Nothing right now, Miki.
Nothing right now, Miki.
